p: Phytocompounds targeting the second major protease PL pro include flavonoids (tomentins) from Paulownia tomentosa ( Cho et al., 2013), chalcones from Angelica keiskei ( Park et al., 2016), and diarylheptanoids extracted from Alnus japonica ( Park et al., 2012), which were reported as potent inhibitors of PL pro of SARS-CoV ( Fig. 5 ).
